sentence: Unilever NV ( UN ) will begin trading ex-dividend on February 05, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3654 per share is scheduled to be paid on March 12, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased UN stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -0.65% decrease from the prior quarter.
The previous trading day's last sale of UN was $36.93, representing a -14.1% decrease from the 52 week high of $42.99 and a 0.08% increase over the 52 week low of $36.90.
UN is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UN's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as .23%, compared to an industry average of 8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UN Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
